entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
